description.value:
Unsuspecting targets are especially vulnerable to your poisons. When you successfully Strike an @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Off-Guard] creature with a poisoned weapon or expose an off-guard creature to an inhaled poison, that creature takes a â€“2 circumstance penalty to its initial save against that poison.
